channel.title: How would I make d claws hit 4 times?
channel.description:
^^ The title pretty much shows it ^^
Right now it hits 2 times, It's pretty much like the dds special except the gfxs..
I tried adding something like: [code] specialDamage = 3; specialDamage = 4; [/code]
But o shit i got an error..
someone help?

item.title: How would I make d claws hit 4 times?
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

o.O O.o:

You’re using DDS spec right? Just copy and paste the two hits. Then alter the variables so they all attack consecutively.

I tried copy and pasting some of the things like the npcdamg thing and stuff… it still didn’t work.
Do you know which code to C&P?

Read full topic
item.source: How would I make d claws hit 4 times?

item.title: How would I make d claws hit 4 times?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Or you could just add the second and first hit masks correctly, then you wouldn’t have to use shitty ‘timers’ to process your hits; you could just do something like:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####) { appendHit(misc.random(getMaxHit())); appendHit(misc.random(getMaxHit())); appendHit(misc.random(getMaxHit())); appendHit(misc.random(getMaxHit())); }

Or something similar.

Read full topic
item.source: How would I make d claws hit 4 times?
